text: We finally know why they got bad blood. The truth behind the Taylor Swift and Katy Perry feud has been largely a mystery. We could guess it had something to do with backup dancers, as Swift previously told Rolling Stone her song “ Bad Blood, ” rumored to be about Perry, was about a singer “ who basically tried to sabotage an entire arena tour. ” Facts were scant, though. Even with Perry ’ s “ Swish, Swish, ” a song rumored to be about Swift that debuted last week ( more than a year after Swift ’ s track ), we didn ’ t know the full story.
